scripts.compile:all: pnpm compile:common:fa2:all && pnpm compile:core:fa2:all && pnpm compile:core:hook:all
scripts.compile:core:fa2: pnpm --silent ligo compile contract src/core-protocol/fa2/main.ligo -e main --file-constants ./build/constants/all.json > ./build/contracts/core-protocol/fa2.tz
scripts.compile:swap-recipe-mint: pnpm --silent ligo -- compile contract src/main/swap-recipe-mint.ligo -e main --file-constants ./build/constants/all.json > ./build/contracts/swap-recipe-mint.tz
scripts.compile:core:hook:ntt: pnpm --silent ligo -- compile contract src/core-protocol/hooks/ntt/main.ligo -e main > ./build/contracts/core-protocol/hooks/ntt.tz
scripts.compile:const:fa2:json: pnpm --silent ligo compile expression --michelson-format json --init-file src/core-protocol/fa2/main.ligo pascaligo $(echo $CONST | tr '-' '_') > ./build/constants/fa2/${CONST}.json
scripts.compile:const:fa2:raw: pnpm --silent ligo compile constant --init-file src/core-protocol/fa2/main.ligo pascaligo $(echo $CONST | tr '-' '_')
